name: WhatieeHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on Whatie switch”
”Alexa, turn off Whatie switch”
”Alexa, turn off the switch”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Amazon Alexa and the Whatie eHome products work together to help you control home appliance easily.You can simply ask Alexa to turn on or turn off the switch. 
Once your Whatie eHome is verified and linked to your Alexa profile, you can discover your devices by saying, “Alexa, discover my devices” or running a device discovery in the Smart Home screen of the Alexa app.
